data.name: Hulk
data.description: An incredibly tough taunter who gets stronger when damaged.

starItems.name: Hulk
starItems.description: An incredibly tough taunter who gets stronger when damaged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If this character has any <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

Heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if the primary target has <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the target and this character gains <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>. This character can only do this once per match.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description:

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>..

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage and adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if the primary target has <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the target and this character gains <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>. This character can only do this once per match.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>33%</color> Armor.
1.nextUpgrade: When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>33%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, clear all negative effects from self
When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health: gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + clear all negative effects from self + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> ally, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health or has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>33%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>25%</color> when this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health
While this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health: gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + clear all negative effects from self + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>25%</color> when this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color> when an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color>

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health: gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + clear all negative effects from self + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> ally, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
